name: DAC
description: DAC (Decentralized Aid Coin) is the token of the Lead Pay cryptocurrency payment platform, granting users the rights to make payments and participate on the platform. It also plays a significant role in ecosystem development, governance decisions, and partnerships. With a total supply of 21 million coins, 1.0 is produced through donation mining, with global mining accounting for 1/11 of it. This is driven by a global consensus mechanism to build a decentralized cryptocurrency payment system.
